channel.title: [Bullsquid] Bullsquid Grenade Glitch
channel.description:
[b][i][COLOR='yellow'][META Data][/i][/b]
[COLOR='Yellow']hostname: Half-Life 2 version : 1.0.1.0/14 4104 insecure map : bm_c1a4d at: 1217 x, 3698 y, -575 z players : 1 (1 max)
setpos 1217.002075 3698.537354 -575.968750;setang 14.540565 5.969021 0.000000[/SIZE]
______________________________________________________
[img]https://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2012/39/1348580685-hereheis.png[/img]
I found a funny glitch with the Bullsquid :
If you throw a grenade to a Bullsquid, but the explosion doesn't kill him, he'll get angry and hit you if you're in range, no matter what's between him and you (it can be a wall, a box etc.).
This is a bit annoying, especially if it makes you drop 100ft into Radioactive Water xD.
Here's a link to a self-made video of this glitch in Blast Pit :
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1b50B-527ag'][COLOR='Red'][b][u]Link to the Video[/u][/b][/SIZE][/url]

item.title: [Bullsquid] Bullsquid Grenade Glitch
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
Heh, it should be noted that the bullsquid was upset from having a box land on him. They break stuff that gets in their way. He didn’t actually mean to hurt you.

Interesting that it penetrates walls/windows, though. That doesn’t seem right.

Read full topic

item.title: [Bullsquid] Bullsquid Grenade Glitch
item.dc:creator: Heisenberg
item.description:
LOL, They are much stronger then we thought!

Read full topic
